entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 07:58 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
